snippet: Golden State’s Andre Iguodala hit a 3-pointer with 5.9 seconds left, and the Nets’ Brook Lopez missed a short jumper at the buzzer. The Warriors then pulled away in the extra period.
lead_paragraph: Golden State’s Andre Iguodala hit a 3-pointer with 5.9 seconds left, and the Nets’ Brook Lopez missed a short jumper at the buzzer. The Warriors then pulled away in the extra period.

headline.main: Warriors Tie Score Late and Top Nets in Overtime
